security_audit.summary: Legitimate Notion API integration. Makes authenticated calls to https://api.notion.com/v1. Reads NOTION_TOKEN from environment for user-provided authentication. No credential theft, command execution, or suspicious network behavior detected.

content.value_statement: Users need to search, create, and manage content in Notion from their AI assistant. This skill provides a complete Notion API integration for searching pages, querying databases, reading page content, and creating or updating pages.
actual_capabilities: Search pages and databases across your Notion workspace
Query Notion databases with filters and sorting
Read page content as structured blocks
Create new pages and database entries
Update page properties, titles, and icons
limitations: Requires a Notion integration token (NOTION_TOKEN environment variable)
Pages and databases must be shared with the integration before access
Cannot access private pages not shared with the integration
Subject to Notion API rate limits (3 requests per second average)

best_practices: Set up a dedicated Notion integration for your AI assistant
Share only specific pages and databases with the integration for security
Use filters and sorting to limit query results and stay within rate limits
anti_patterns: Sharing your entire workspace with the integration
Storing the NOTION_TOKEN in version control
Making rapid API calls without respecting rate limits

faq.question: What is required to use this skill?
faq.answer: You need a Notion integration token. Create one at notion.so/my-integrations and set the NOTION_TOKEN environment variable.

faq.question: What rate limits apply?
faq.answer: Notion API allows about 3 requests per second on average. The skill returns errors when rate limited.

faq.question: Can I access private pages?
faq.answer: No. Pages and databases must be explicitly shared with your integration via the Add connections menu.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only accesses pages you explicitly share. No data is stored or sent anywhere other than the Notion API.

faq.question: Why am I getting authentication errors?
faq.answer: Check that NOTION_TOKEN is set correctly and that your target pages/databases are shared with the integration.

faq.question: How is this different from other Notion tools?
faq.answer: This skill uses the official Notion API directly without third-party wrappers, providing full access to all API features.
